# W0134-24R012 - Laundry and Dry Cleaning Services for CFB Cold Lake
## English Announcement
### Request for Standing Offer
(Exercise #WP-0118, Supply and Services Canada)

#### Background
A Standing Offer is being solicited for the provision of laundry and dry cleaning services to the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) at CFB Cold Lake, Alberta. The contractor will be responsible for the pick-up, delivery, and processing of all items.

#### Objective
The contractor will provide all necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision for laundry and dry cleaning services on an as-and-when-required basis.

#### Tender Details
- **Tender Solicitation Number:** WS4343860638
- **Publication Date:** December 20, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** January 12, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
- **Contract Period:** 3 years (April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2027)
- **Tender Status:** Expired (Please disregard Ariba Discovery response deadline)

#### Evaluation Criteria
- **Evaluation Criteria:** Price

#### Delivery and Pickup
The contractor's facility must be within a 75 km radius of CFB Cold Lake, Cold Lake, Alberta.

#### Standing Offer
The offeror must be able to provide all necessary documentation and demonstrate a clear understanding of the terms and conditions.
